Description: Lower body sherd of Chian, possibly Mature Animal Style or Grand Style, pottery chalice; discoloured white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands; exterior: two bands; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The lower body of Chian chalices in the Mature Animal Style and Grand Styles are frequently decorated by wide bands.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0655) (phase 2)
